Uses of Package
org.apache.freemarker.core

  • Packages that use org.apache.freemarker.core 
    Package Description
    org.apache.freemarker.core
    The most commonly used API-s of FreeMarker; start with Configuration (see also the Getting Stared in the Manual.)
    org.apache.freemarker.core.arithmetic
    Arithmetic used in templates: Base classes/interfaces.
    org.apache.freemarker.core.arithmetic.impl
    Arithmetic used in templates: Standard implementations.
    org.apache.freemarker.core.debug
    Debugging API; experimental status, might change! This is to support debugging in IDE-s.
    org.apache.freemarker.core.model
    Data model and template language type system: Base classes/interfaces.
    org.apache.freemarker.core.model.impl
    Data model and template language type system: Standard implementations.
    org.apache.freemarker.core.outputformat
    Template output format: Base classes/interfaces
    org.apache.freemarker.core.outputformat.impl
    Template output format: Standard implementations.
    org.apache.freemarker.core.templateresolver
    Template lookup, loading, and caching: Base classes/interfaces
    org.apache.freemarker.core.templateresolver.impl
    Template lookup, loading and caching: Standard implementations.
    org.apache.freemarker.core.util
    Various classes used by core FreeMarker code but might be useful outside of it too.
    org.apache.freemarker.core.valueformat
    Formatting values shown in templates: Base classes/interfaces
    org.apache.freemarker.core.valueformat.impl
    Formatting values shown in templates: Standard implementations.
    org.apache.freemarker.dom
    Exposes DOM XML nodes to templates as easily traversable trees; see in the Manual.
    org.apache.freemarker.servlet
    Servlet for legacy "Model 2" frameworks that allows using FreeMarker templates instead of JSP as the MVC View (see in the Manual), also custom JSP tag support.
    org.apache.freemarker.servlet.jsp
    Allows JSP custom tags to be used inside FreeMarker templates as if they where FreeMarker directives.
    org.apache.freemarker.spring
    Spring Framework (MVC) Support
    org.apache.freemarker.spring.model
    FreeMarker Directives and Functions Support for Spring Framework MVC
    org.apache.freemarker.spring.web.view
    Spring Framework MVC View Support
  • Classes in org.apache.freemarker.core used by org.apache.freemarker.core 
    Class and Description
    AttemptExceptionReporter
    Used for the attemptExceptionReported configuration setting.
    AutoEscapingPolicy
    Used as the value of the autoEscapingPolicy setting.
    CallPlace
    The place (in a template, usually) from where a directive (like a macro) or function was called; Do not implement this interface yourself, as new methods may be added any time! Only FreeMarker itself should provide implementations.
    CallPlaceCustomDataInitializationException
    Thrown by CallPlace.getOrCreateCustomData(Object, CommonSupplier)
    Configuration
    The main entry point into the FreeMarker API; encapsulates the configuration settings of FreeMarker, also serves as a central template-loading and caching service.
    Configuration.ExtendableBuilder
    Usually you use Configuration.Builder instead of this abstract class, except where you declare the type of a method parameter or field, where the more generic Configuration.ExtendableBuilder should be used.
    ConfigurationException
    Error while configuring FreeMarker.
    CustomSettingValueNotSetException
    Thrown by ProcessingConfiguration.getCustomSetting(Serializable) if the custom setting is not set.
    CustomStateKey
    Used with CustomStateScope-s; each subclass must have exactly one instance, which should be stored in a static final field.
    CustomStateScope
    An object that's a scope that can store custom state objects.
    Environment
    Object that represents the runtime environment during template processing.
    Environment.Namespace 
    InvalidSettingNameException
    Thrown by Configuration.ExtendableBuilder.setSetting(String, String) if the setting name was not recognized.
    MutableParsingAndProcessingConfiguration 
    MutableProcessingConfiguration
    Extended by FreeMarker core classes (not by you) that support specifying ProcessingConfiguration setting values.
    NonTemplateCallPlace
    CallPlace used when a TemplateDirectiveModel is called from outside a template (such as from user Java code).
    ParseException
    Parsing-time exception in a template (as opposed to a runtime exception, a TemplateException).
    ParsingAndProcessingConfiguration
    Don't implement this interface yourself; use the existing implementation(s).
    ParsingConfiguration
    Implemented by FreeMarker core classes (not by you) that provide configuration settings that affect template parsing (as opposed to (Object, Writer) template processing).
    ProcessingConfiguration
    Implemented by FreeMarker core classes (not by you) that provide configuration settings that affect template processing (as opposed to template parsing).
    SettingValueNotSetException
    Thrown when you try to read a configuration setting which wasn't set and isn't inherited from a parent object and has no default either.
    TagSyntax
    Used as the value of the ParsingConfiguration.getTagSyntax() tagSyntax} setting.
    Template
    Stores an already parsed template, ready to be processed (rendered) for unlimited times, possibly from multiple threads.
    TemplateClassResolver
    Used by built-ins and other template language features that get a class based on a string.
    TemplateConfiguration
    A partial set of configuration settings used for customizing the Configuration-level settings for individual Template-s (or rather, for a group of templates).
    TemplateException
    Runtime exception in a template (as opposed to a parsing-time exception: ParseException).
    TemplateExceptionHandler
    Used for the templateExceptionHandler configuration setting; see MutableProcessingConfiguration.setTemplateExceptionHandler(TemplateExceptionHandler) for more.
    TemplateLanguage
    Represents a template language.
    TemplateNotFoundException
    Thrown when Configuration.getTemplate(String) (or similar) doesn't find a template.
    TopLevelConfiguration
    Implemented by FreeMarker core classes (not by you) that provide Configuration-level settings.
    Version
    Represents a version number plus the further qualifiers and build info.
  • Classes in org.apache.freemarker.core used by org.apache.freemarker.core.arithmetic
